title: Jax can block Garen's ult with E
body:
???????????????

There's no possible way this is intentional right?

Garen's ult is single target, not aoe.

pls no {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
No it blocks all physical attacks for that amount of time! 
But the thing I am confused is : I was tf and i used my gold card on jax while his e was active and didn't stun him !  So even tf's q is treated as a physical attack?

No, it does not block all physical attacks, and even if it did it still wouldn't work against Garen's ultimate because it does magic damage, or true damage to the Villain, but not physical damage.

Jax's E dodges all basic attacks, as well as any abilities that enhance basic attacks, like Twisted Fate's W, Nasus' Q, or Wukong's Q. There was also a recent change to Jax's E for consistency, so now it allows Jax to dodge all enhanced basic attacks as well as any CC effects tied to them, as there were some abilities that just completely ignored Jax's E even though they were still auto attacks. This includes stuff like the stuns from Twisted Fate's Gold Card, Leona's Q, or Udyr's Bear Stance.

It also dodges ALL aoe abilties.

Garen's R aint AoE tho

> [{quoted}](name=Zombiemaster,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=uFzzf3M1,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-05T17:11:46.353+0000)
>
> No, it does not block all physical attacks, and even if it did it still wouldn't work against Garen's ultimate because it does magic damage, or true damage to the Villain, but not physical damage.
> 
> Jax's E dodges all basic attacks, as well as any abilities that enhance basic attacks, like Twisted Fate's W, Nasus' Q, or Wukong's Q. There was also a recent change to Jax's E for consistency, so now it allows Jax to dodge all enhanced basic attacks as well as any CC effects tied to them, as there were some abilities that just completely ignored Jax's E even though they were still auto attacks. This includes stuff like the stuns from Twisted Fate's Gold Card, Leona's Q, or Udyr's Bear Stance.

Oh.. alright i understand .. thank you.. I was confused..

Pretty sure it only blocks auto attacks. So it shouldn't block Garen's ult at all. 

As for the TF gold card thing, it's considered an auto attack so Jax can dodge it. And since he doesn't get hit by it the stun doesn't proc.

He did purchase one, but this had occured before that. He only had a corruption potion in his inventory. 

Later on when he did have one, if I was to ult while he was e'ing, the shield would pop, BUT, it would take no damage.

If the shield pop'd it means he took magic damage.

Otherwise Maw wouldn't activate.

{{item:3068}} was starting the initial proc.

It did not tank{{champion:86}} 's ult, as the ult was blocked by {{champion:24}} 's E in full.
this is definitely a bug. His E is only supposed to dodge Autos and decrease the damage of AOE spells by 20% (I think)
